prompt_text: 3D clay model illustration of an elegant xylophone with wooden keys arranged in rainbow gradient from warm orange to purple. Soft rounded edges, matte clay texture, sitting on simple curved legs. Warm peach and cream tones dominate. Diffused studio lighting, transparent background, cozy and playful style.

3D clay model of a vintage broadcast microphone, 18cm tall, classic streamlined design with rounded base and cylindrical body. Warm orange and cream colors with peach accents. Matte clay finish, soft shadows, professional but playful look. Transparent background.

3D clay model illustration of ornate golden crown (8cm height) sitting atop a vintage microphone. Crown features soft rounded points and warm orange-to-gold gradient. Microphone is cream colored with peach highlights. Playful king of audio concept. Matte texture, warm lighting, transparent background.

3D clay model of retro audio cassette tape with visible reels. Warm orange body with cream-colored label area. Soft rounded corners, matte finish. Nostalgic and cozy feel. Transparent background, studio lighting.

3D clay model of modern over-ear headphones with chunky rounded design. Warm orange ear cups with cream-colored headband. Soft matte texture, cozy proportions, slightly exaggerated size for playful look. Transparent background.

3D clay model of 1950s-style table radio with rounded corners and soft antenna. Warm orange-brown body with cream-colored dial face. Circular speaker grille pattern. Matte clay finish, nostalgic and warm feel. Transparent background.

3D clay model of traditional Black Forest cuckoo clock, 20cm tall, with characteristic house shape and carved decorations. Warm brown and orange tones with cream details. Soft rounded edges, matte clay texture. Cozy and whimsical interpretation of German cultural icon. Transparent background.

3D clay model of giant twisted pretzel, 20cm wide, with characteristic knot shape. Warm brown dough color with white salt crystals as small clay dots. Soft rounded form, matte texture, appetizing and playful look. Transparent background, soft lighting.

3D clay model of traditional German beer stein with lid, featuring soft rounded form and decorative details. Cream-colored ceramic body with warm orange-brown lid and handle. Matte clay finish, cozy tavern atmosphere. Transparent background.

3D clay model miniature set showing traditional Bavarian lederhosen and dirndl outfit elements. Soft rounded forms, warm brown leather tones with cream and peach fabric accents. Playful and respectful cultural representation. Matte texture, transparent background.

3D clay model illustration of miniature cozy workshop interior, 15cm wide. Small workbench with tools, warm lighting from tiny window, shelves with creative supplies. Warm orange, cream, and brown tones. Detailed but soft, inviting craftsman atmosphere. Transparent or warm gradient background.

3D clay model of miniature professional recording studio setup. Mixing console with colorful buttons, microphone stand, monitor speakers, acoustic panels on walls. Warm orange and cream color scheme. Detailed but approachable, cozy creative space. Transparent background.

3D clay model of traditional wooden artist palette with paint blobs in warm colors (orange, peach, cream, brown). Several brushes with soft rounded bristles. Matte clay texture, creative and inviting feel. Transparent background, soft lighting.

3D clay model of vintage typewriter with rounded keys and warm orange-cream color scheme. Soft matte finish, nostalgic writing tool. Paper sheet visible in carriage. Cozy creative atmosphere. Transparent background.

3D clay model of towering burger with multiple layers. Glossy bun with sesame seeds, cheese, lettuce, tomato, patty in exaggerated stacked formation. Warm orange-brown tones with cream and peach accents. Slightly glossy glazy finish but still clay-like. Playful proportions. Transparent background.

3D clay model of single pizza slice with melted cheese stretching. Warm orange-red sauce, cream-colored cheese, brown crust. Slightly glossy cheese surface, matte crust. Appetizing and playful food metaphor. Transparent background.

3D clay model of watermelon slice with pink-orange flesh, black seeds as small dots, and green rind. Fresh and juicy appearance with slightly glossy surface on fruit. Summery and refreshing vibe. Transparent background, soft lighting.

3D clay model of colorful bento lunch box with compartments visible from above. Various food items in warm colors: orange rice, peach-colored protein, cream-colored sides. Organized and appetizing presentation. Matte finish, transparent background.
3D clay model of steaming coffee cup on saucer surrounded by coffee beans. Warm brown and cream colors, visible steam swirls. Cozy morning atmosphere, matte clay texture. Transparent background.

3D clay model of classic rotary dial telephone in warm orange color with cream handset. Soft rounded form, nostalgic telephone service concept. Matte clay texture, cozy and approachable. Transparent background.

3D clay model abstract representation of PBX phone system. Simplified server/box shape with multiple connection ports shown as colorful rounded plugs. Warm orange body with cream and peach connection elements. Technical but approachable. Transparent background.

3D clay model of classic Italian scooter/Vespa in warm orange color. Rounded forms, chrome details in cream color. Retro mobility and delivery service concept. Matte clay finish with some glossy accents. Transparent background.

3D clay model of vintage desktop computer with CRT monitor and keyboard. Warm beige-orange color scheme reminiscent of 1980s-90s computers. Rounded edges, nostalgic tech aesthetic. Matte clay texture, transparent background.

3D clay model of friendly robot helping with tasks. Rounded cylindrical body in warm orange, cream-colored display screen face showing simple smile. Articulated arms in soft shapes. Helpful AI assistant concept, cozy and non-threatening. Transparent background.
3D clay icon of triangular play button in warm orange, raised from circular cream-colored base. Soft shadows, matte finish, simple and clean design for audio player interface. Transparent background.

Simplified 3D clay icon of microphone shape - rounded capsule on short stand. Solid warm orange color, matte finish, minimal details for icon usage. Transparent background, consistent with Tonwerk icon style.
3D clay icon of classic telephone handset in curved shape. Warm orange color, simplified form suitable for UI. Matte texture, soft rounded edges. Transparent background.
3D clay icon of musical eighth note in warm orange. Clean simplified shape with soft rounded edges, suitable for UI and branding. Matte finish, transparent background.
3D clay icon of five-pointed star with soft rounded tips. Warm orange-to-peach gradient, matte finish, slight raise for depth. Quality indicator or badge concept. Transparent background.
3D clay icon of round clock face showing 10:10 time with simplified hands. Warm orange frame with cream-colored face. Matte texture, clean design for UI. Transparent background.

3D clay character mascot representing Tonwerk brand. Friendly anthropomorphic audio wave or sound blob with simple face (two dots for eyes, curved line smile). Warm orange body with peach shading, rounded soft form. Standing pose with subtle arms. Cozy and approachable personality. Transparent background.

3D clay character of friendly vintage telephone operator. Simple humanoid form with headset, warm color palette (orange uniform, cream skin tones). Retro but modern interpretation, welcoming gesture. Matte clay texture, transparent background.

3D clay illustration of abstract sound waves flowing in curved motion. Warm orange to peach gradient, soft rounded wave forms. Can be used as decorative element or background. Semi-transparent for layering, matte finish.

Set of three 3D clay organic blob shapes in different sizes. Warm color variations: orange, peach, and cream. Soft rounded forms for background decorations. Matte texture, can overlap for depth. Transparent backgrounds.

3D clay illustration of falling confetti pieces in Tonwerk colors - orange, peach, cream, purple, pink. Various shapes (circles, rectangles, triangles) in soft rounded clay form. Celebratory and playful mood. Transparent background.
